name: micasa
description: Micasa is a software domotica controller designed to interconnect various types of hardware.

scripts.build_dev: npm run build && cp dev.html index.html
scripts.build_prod: npm run build && npm run _environment && npm run _browserify && npm run _uglify && npm run _styles && cp prod.html index.html
scripts._environment:
echo "/* micasa */

" > app/app.js && for f in node_modules/core-js/client/shim.min.js node_modules/zone.js/dist/zone.js node_modules/reflect-metadata/Reflect.js; do (cat "${f}"; printf "
 
") >> app/app.js; done
scripts._styles:
cp -r node_modules/font-awesome/fonts/. fonts && echo "/* micasa */

" > css/env.css && for f in node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css node_modules/font-awesome/css/font-awesome.min.css; do (cat "${f}"; printf "
 
") >> css/env.css; done
